metadata.dc:author: Tapia P, Cecilia
metadata.dc:title: NDV-3, una vacuna recombinante para Candida spp. y Staphylococcus aureus
[NDV-3, a recombinant alum-adjuvanted vaccine for Candida and Staphylococcus aureus, is safe and immunogenic in healthy adults].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista chilena de infectologia : organo oficial de la Sociedad Chilena de Infectologia
